skills.name: Expose Weakness
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and looks for its weakness. This attack decreases the enemy's Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Death Verdict
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 75% chance to leave a Brand for 2 turns. Enemies with a Brand will receive 25% increased damage.

skills.name: Blade Dance of the Reaper
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases its Attack Bar by 10% for each attack. The number of strikes will increase up to 7 hits accordingly to your Attack Speed.
